```{r setup, warning=FALSE}

library(nnet)
library(caret)
library(plotluck)
library(inspectdf)
library(magrittr)

##### Set Defaults

theme_set(new = theme_bw())

options(digits = 4)

```

```{r data}
data("diamonds")


```

```{r inspect, warning=FALSE}

inspect_types(diamonds) %>% 
  show_plot()

inspect_na(diamonds) %>% 
  show_plot()

inspect_cor(diamonds,
            method = "spearman") %>% 
  show_plot()

```

```{r plot,message=FALSE}

plotForm <- as.formula(cut ~ clarity + color)

plotluck(data = diamonds,
         formula = plotForm,
         weights = price)

```
